messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the local bigwig and father to the kidnapped girl?
Lucas Strong

What is the goal of unearthing the crystal and delivering it to their god in the lake?
To deliver the crystal to their god in the lake
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the kidnapped girl, age 16?
Jane Strong

Eugene Clayton

Eugene Clayton, Sidney Harris, and Christopher Dobbs.

The kidnapped girl, age 16.

Brian and Arthur Hall, Alistair and George Lawson (two father and son teams)

They are civil war deserters

To use its influence to lead its servants to seek out and destroy a fragment of its crystal prison

What is the date of the events of Day 0?
Friday, June 19th 1925

Brian and Arthur Hall, Alistair and George Lawson (two father and son teams)

To sacrifice innocent people to Gla'aki and unearth a buried crystal

The Thing in the Lake, a manifestation of the Great Old One, Gla'aki

A timeline of major events, starting from Day 0: Friday, June 19th 1925

Joseph Turner and his gang of civil war deserters

Towards the end of the night, in the forest near the lake

To sacrifice innocent people to Gla'aki and unearth a buried crystal

Sidney Harris runs back into the forest with Eugene Clayton

Brian and Arthur Hall

What happened to the artist who escaped from Hut 4?
He was fatally wounded but began to make his way back towards Bennington to seek help.

Christoopher Dobbs
